content.Heading: Designed for those who have a keen interest in becoming a home-based professional in baby care, iCare utilizes a more focused and hands-on environment together with the relevant skill sets in order to provide you with confidence.

items.descritpion: Through interactive training methods, individuals will learn salient points and practical knowledge which relate to taking care of babies and managing the expectations.
